name: Coupa Request Pub/Sub - Fetch PO Lines
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: subscribe_to_topic
code.description: New message in Coupa Requests PubSub topic

properties.label: fetch-open-pos: Offset
properties.name: fetch_open_pos_offset
properties.hint: offset for the next 50 POs to fetch

properties.label: fetch-open-pos: Thread Number
properties.name: fetch_open_pos_thread
properties.hint: identifier for the thread so we can track its status

properties.label: fetch-po-req: Purchase Order ID
properties.name: fetch_po_req_po_id
properties.hint: ID of the PO related to the Requisition

properties.label: fetch-po-req: Requisition ID
properties.name: fetch_po_req_req_id
properties.hint: ID of the Requisition Header to fetch

properties.label: fetch-po-lines: Purchase Order ID
properties.name: fetch_po_lines_po_id
properties.hint: ID of the Purchase Order related to the PO lines

properties.label: send-open-po-report: Requisitioner Email
properties.name: send_open_po_report_email
properties.hint: email for which to send open PO report

block.name: create_list
block.comment: Create a helper list to do multiple fetches of PO lines if there are more than 50

extended_input_schema.name: path
extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://rapid7-test.coupahost.com/ - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

input.stop_reason: no more po lines to fetch

block.comment: If there are less than 50 items in the search results, stop the loop

conditions.rhs: no more po lines to fetch

block.comment: If the error is "no more po lines to fetch", then continue with the job. Otherwise report the error.

block.name: update_variable
block.title: Update variable po_currency
block.comment: If the currency is different among PO lines, use the accounting currency
If the currency is consistent for all PO lines, use that currency as the reporting currency

block.name: call_service_async
block.description: Call recipe Coupa - Calculate Total PO Remaining (do not wait for response)

properties.label: PO Total
properties.name: po_total
properties.hint: total of the PO in the currency specified in the PO lines.  If the po_currency is "accounting_currency", this value is meaningless since it will have summed PO lines using different currencies

properties.label: PO Accounting Total
properties.name: po_accounting_total
properties.hint: total of the po using the accounting currency

properties.label: PO Currency
properties.name: po_currency
properties.hint: will either be the currency of the PO lines (if they are all the same) or "accounting_currency" if the PO lines use different currencies

block.comment: Make a call to update the total invoiced and total remaining fields
